content: Home page of Mohammad R. Salavatipour Mohammad R. Salavatipour, Professor Associate Dean Graduate studies Department of Computing Science, University of Alberta Edmonton, AB T6G2E8 Office:  UComm 6-237 E-mail: mrs put-at-sign-here ualberta.ca Fax:      (780)492-1071 Publications CV Recent courses: NEW CMPUT 498/501: Advanced Algorithms ( Fall 2025) CMPUT 675: Approximation Algorithms (Winter 2022) CMPUT 675: Algorithms for streaming and big data (Fall 2019) CMPUT 272: Formal Systems and Logic in Computing Science (Fall 2020, 2019, 2018, 2017, 2016, 2015, Winter 2015) CMPUT 675: Approximation Algorithms (Winter 2018) CMPUT 304: Fall 2017, 2016, 2008 CMPUT 675: Approximation Algorithms and Approximability (Fall 2015) Older courses can be found here.
